Package Controller.Utilities

Class Config

java.lang.Object
Controller.Utilities.Config
public class Config extends Object
This class is a container for static values that represent the configuration of all the application settings.
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele

  • Nested Class Summary

    static enum 
    Config.KEYS
    Keys for configs hashmap representation: KEY VALUE EFFECTS_VOLUME "effectsVolume" MUSIC_VOLUME "musicVolume" DECK_STYLE "deckStyle" GRAPHIC_QUALITY "graphicQuality" SAVED_ICON_PATH "savedIconPath" LOGGED_PLAYER "player" CONFIG "config"

  • Method Details

    • assignDefaultValues

      public static void assignDefaultValues()
      Sets the default player, with associated default settings values:
      Value default value associated
      effectsVolume 50
      musicVolume 50
      deckStyle DeckColor.WHITE
      graphicQuality GraphicQuality.LOW
      savedIconPath DEFAULT_ICON_PATH

    • refreshScalingPercentage

      public static void refreshScalingPercentage()
      Calculates the actual scaling percentage basing on current window dimensions

    • getPlayerConfig

      public static HashMap<Object,Object> getPlayerConfig(HumanPlayer player)
      Parameters:
      player -
      Returns:
      an HashMap representation of the players personal Config that uses Config.KEYS.VALUE as keys

    • getHashMap

      private static HashMap<Object,Object> getHashMap(int effectsVolume, int musicVolume, DeckColor deckStyle, GraphicQuality graphicQuality, String savedIconPath)
      Parameters:
      effectsVolume -
      musicVolume -
      deckStyle -
      graphicQuality -
      savedIconPath -
      Returns:
      an HashMap representation of the given values that uses Config.KEYS.VALUE as keys

    • setHashMap

      public static void setHashMap(HashMap<Object,Object> config) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      config - Sets the stats basing on a given HashMap that uses Config.KEYS.VALUE as keys.
      The expected attributes are:
      • EFFECTS_VOLUME
      • MUSIC_VOLUME
      • GRAPHIC_QUALITY
      • DECK_STYLE
      • SAVED_ICON_PATH
      Throws:
      Exception - if it doesn't find any attribute throws
      See Also:
      • Config.KEYS

    • getDefaultSettings

      public static HashMap<Object,Object> getDefaultSettings()
      Default settings values:
      Value default value associated
      "effectsVolume" 50
      "musicVolume" 50
      "deckStyle" DeckColor.WHITE
      "graphicQuality" GraphicQuality.LOW
      "savedIconPath" DEFAULT_ICON_PATH
      Returns:
      the HashMap representation, that uses Config.KEYS.VALUE as keys

    • getSettings

      public static HashMap<Object,Object> getSettings()
      Returns:
      the HashMap representation of the actual settings, that uses Config.KEYS.VALUE as keys

    • storeConfig

      public static void storeConfig()
      Delegates the storing of the actual Config into the database.
